name: Add abgx360 To Right Click Menu
short_description:
just a little regfile that adds  abgx360 to the right click menu. when you right click an ISO and select abgx360 it will execute this command

I WILL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE if your Xbox 360 gets banned from xbox live...

options this command will use

Check for AnyDVD style game corruption
AutoFix Level 3
Adjust SS v1 angle 359 for iXtreme < v1.4
Region Code: 000000FF - NTSC/U
SplitVid: Add it if it doesn't exist or isn't valid

this will normally AutoFix the ISO but THIS WILL NOT WORK on ISO's that require Manual Patching you will need to use the GUI for that.

read the READ ME for more INFO on which file you need..
summary: Verify XGD3 Games with abgx360 From the right click menu!
